Conferences.Description: Welcome to FalafelCon! Explore this demo conference to learn about the features of EventBoard.With EventBoard, the paper conference catalog is a thing of the past. This mobile application allows you to read detailed information about conference sessions and speakers directly on your phone. Finding interesting sessions is an effortless task with the many filter options available. Once found, you can bookmark or register for a session and later rate that session directly on the mobile device. If you are an organizer of a conference, you will find the two way communication capabilities of EventBoard to be invaluable. Attendees will never miss a conference update because catalog changes can be delivered electronically to their phones. Session registration and session ratings provide immediate information, allowing you to prepare for attendance demands and evaluate the success of each and every session.Thank you from Falafel Software!
Conferences.Name: FalafelCon Demo

Conferences.Description: MIX is a 3 day conference for web designers and developers building the world's most innovative web sites.
Conferences.Name: MIX 2010

Conferences.Description: The event for IT professionals who want to get ahead and stay ahead of the game.
Conferences.Name: TechEd North America 2010

Conferences.Description:
Code Camp is a new type of community event where developers learn from fellow developers. All are welcome to attend and speak.
Special thanks to Peter Kellner for helping build the OData feeds for this application, as well as our awesome graphics designer Matt Kurvin, who makes everything look like a million bucks!
Conferences.Name: Silicon Valley Code Camp 2010

Conferences.Description:
DevReach is the premier developer conference on Microsoft technologies in Southeastern Europe. The conference is intended for IT professionals engaged or interested in application development, based on Microsoft technologies.
Special thanks to Telerik for putting together the OData feed for the conference.
Conferences.Name: DevReach 2010

Conferences.Description: Since 1991, the PDC has been the epicenter of Microsoft’s biggest platform announcements. This year will be no exception. Leading-edge developers and architects will gather in Redmond this October to hear firsthand from Microsoft’s leaders about the next generation of Microsoft developer technologies.
Conferences.Name: PDC 2010

Conferences.Description: Tech·Ed is Microsoft’s premier technical education event providing the most comprehensive technical training on Microsoft’s suite of products, technologies, solutions and services.
Conferences.Name: Tech Ed Europe 2010

Conferences.Description:
MWUG is the largest independent user group for QAD's manufacturing management and Enterprise Application software. We represent manufacturing companies in the Midwestern U.S. as well as QAD partners and other product/service providers who support QAD systems.
Our mission is to provide a forum for members to share and exchange information through educational conferences, to establish mutual support and peer contacts, and to promote and advance the use of our members' ERP systems.
Conferences.Name: MWUG Spring 2011

Conferences.Description:
TechDays är den största utbildningskonferensen i Sverige för dig som arbetar med Microsofts produkter, plattform och lösningar.
Upplev den senaste tekniken, lyssna till de bästa experterna, bygg relationer och nätverka med kollegor från hela landet.
Conferences.Name: TechDays Sweden 2011

Conferences.Description: MIX is a gathering of developers, designers, UX experts and business professionals creating the most innovative and profitable consumer sites on the web. Sessions range from technical, code-based topics to expert advice on content strategy, usability and design. Explore the future of the standards-based web – join the conversation at MIX11.
Conferences.Name: MIX 2011

Conferences.Description:
The 19th annual Microsoft Tech·Ed North America conference provides developers and IT professionals the most comprehensive technical education across Microsoft's current and soon-to-be-released suite of products, solutions and services.
Our four day event at the Georgia World Congress Center in Atlanta, Georgia offers hands-on learning, deep product exploration and opportunities to connect with industry and Microsoft experts one-to-one. If you are developing, deploying, managing, securing and mobilizing Microsoft solutions, Tech·Ed is the conference that will help you solve today's real-world IT challenges and prepare for tomorrow's innovations.
Conferences.Name: TechEd North America 2011

Conferences.Description: The devLink Technical Conference is focused on improving the skills of the community.  The more you know the better you are at your job.
Conferences.Name: DevLink 2011
